text: Hips Don't Lie is a 2006 Latin pop hit song by Colombian singer Shakira and Wyclef Jean. It came out in her album Oral Fixation Vol. 2. The song has Latin style drums and Wyclef's rap. The song became Number 1 in many countries. It samples the song "Amores Como El Nuestro" by Jerry Rivera. ==Charts== Chart (2006) Peak position Australian ARIA Singles Chart 1 Austrian Singles Charthttp://lescharts.com/showitem.asp?interpret=Shakira+feat.+Wyclef+Jean&titel;=Hips+Don%27t+Lie&cat;=s 2 Belgian Singles Chart 1 Canadian Singles Chart 2 Danish Singles Chart 4 Dutch Top 40 1 Eurochart Hot 100 Singles 1 Finnish Singles Chart 2 French SNEP Singles Chart 1 German Singles Chart 1 Irish Singles Chart 1 Italian FIMI Singles Chart 1 Japanese Oricon International Singles 1 New Zealand RIANZ Singles Chart 1 Norwegian Singles Chart 2 Portugal Singles Chart 3 Romanian Singles Chart 1 Russian Airplay Charthttp://tophit.ru/cgi- bin/trackinfo.cgi?id=5085 2 Swedish Singles Chart 45 Swiss Singles Chart 1 UK Singles Chart 1 U.S. Billboard Hot 100 1 U.S. Billboard Pop 100 1 U.S. Billboard Hot Latin Tracks 1 U.S. Billboard Hot Dance Airplay 10 U.S. ARC Weekly Top 40 1 ==References== Category:2006 songs Category:Shakira songs Category:Wyclef Jean songs Category:Billboard Hot 100 number one songs
title: Hips Don't Lie
